txt.en: 'Excuse me, I am quite busy. A letter for me? Thank you. I shall read it when I find a moment.'
'Yes? What ails you, friend? Why, this is...\n\n'We do not do what we do to gather thanks, but thoughtful things such as this really do reinvigourate one.'
'Have you delivered all of the invitations?'
'Hmm? Are you a patient? Oh, for me?\n\n'Ah, says here she is feeling much better. I knew that tonic would do the trick.'
The sneaky hobbit can be found near the Party Tree in The Shire.\n\nYou should let the sneaky hobbit know that you have delivered all of the invitations.
'A letter for me? A request for potions, no doubt.\n\n'Why this is no request at all, but a note of gratitude. Somehow, my tasks seem to be a bit lighter now.'
A postmaster in Minas Tirith needs help delivering mail to the city's healers.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
DNT - \n'Hah! I knew Lobelia was wrong about them not inviting me! Wait 'till I show her this!'

'Ah, thank you, my friend. Much better than delivering debt notices, is it not?\n\n'If you have the time on the morrow, do come back. I shall have more letters to deliver, of that you can be certain.'

'Hello, hello! I heard that you shall be assisting us. You haven’t any idea how grateful I am. If you could spare the time, I am quite overwhelmed with letters that need to be delivered about the city.\n\n'Excellent! I have a pleasant task here – A stack of thank-you letters for healers at the Houses of Healing.'
Healers can be found in the Houses of Healing on the Sixth Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nDeliver the letters to the healers.
The Postmaster is in the House of Craft on the Third Circle of Minas Tirith.\n\nYou should let the Postmaster know that you have delivered all of the letters.
'What have you there? A letter of thanks from someone I tended? Oh, how lovely!'
'A letter? For me? Why how nice! I often do not hear from those I tend to. This just warms the heart.'
